body.name: Ardell Eyebrows Trimmer and Shaper for Women, 3 count x pack of 3 Brow Razors
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 27 mins
features: Pro Eyebrow Trimmer and Shaper: Ardell’s dual-function eyebrow tool with a comb to trim and a razor to shape brows. Helps maintain well-groomed and defined brows at home or on the go. Suitable for use on eyebrows, facial hair, and other areas.

Painless Trimming Experience: Features a stainless steel razor that is gentle on the skin and reduces the risk of nicks and cuts. Eliminates the shortest or finest hairs from the root. Follows the natural contours of your face for a comfortable experience.

Quick and Easy Brow Shaping: Designed to easily and precisely remove unwanted eyebrow hairs. Features a comb to trim and a razor to shape brows, making it easy to remove unwanted hair and achieve a well-defined brow area.

On-The-Go Brow Tool: Each pack includes 3 razors in different colors. Compact and lightweight design that makes it easy to carry in a makeup bag or purse. Comes with a protective cap for safe storage and transport.
body.description: Perfect your brows and transform your look with Ardell Brow Trim & Shape. Glam up those eyebrows like never before with Ardell’s Brow Trim & Shape, an easy, convenient, and no-mess tool for trimming and shaping eyebrows without painful plucking. The unique design helps prevent cuts, nicks, and irritation of delicate skin. These hair trimmers are also perfect for use on your face, neck, arms, and bikini area. Easy, quick, and painless trimming experience Lightweight and long grip handle for easy control Safety guard helps prevent nicks, cuts, and irritation 3 colorful disposable razors per package Ideal for removing peach fuzz for smooth and flawless skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ardell, one of the most widely recognized name in faux lashes and brow artistry by catering not just to legions of beauty professionals and Hollywood makeup artists but also to women looking to enhance their own beauty. The comfort and affordability of our products make us a small luxury that elevates any makeup look to another level. We offer an extensive array of faux lashes, brows design essentials, and color cosmetics to suit every woman, every skin type, every event, and every lifestyle. Perfect your brows and transform your look with Ardell Brow Trim & Shape. Glam up those eyebrows like never before with Ardell’s Brow Trim & Shape, an easy, convenient, and no-mess tool for trimming and shaping eyebrows without painful plucking. The unique design helps prevent cuts, nicks, and irritation of delicate skin. These hair trimmers are also perfect for use on your face, neck, arms, and bikini area. Easy, quick, and painless trimming experience Lightweight and long grip handle for easy control Safety guard helps prevent nicks, cuts, and irritation 3 colorful disposable razors per package Ideal for removing peach fuzz for smooth and flawless skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love these, and will keep ordering them! I’ve hated my eyebrows since I knew they mattered. These are perfect!! They’re sharp for a long time! (Gave 1 to a friend and a daughter and myself). With eyebrow makeup to fill in… my makeup is finally perfectly done. And I feel completely put together. Consider giving these a chance. My only advice is to never forget how sharp they are and remain to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Good bang for the buck as they are reusable and do a great job of microplaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with careful use
reviews.reviewText: With careful use (don't push too hard), this works great for eyebrows and facial hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What I got was NOT ardel. It was some no name brand and the blades were so cheap and dull that these were completely unusable. I could feel them pulling my skin. Completely unacceptable. Disgusted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little razors
reviews.reviewText: Love these little razors for a little diy dermaplaning/ removing peach fuzz from my face. This is also a great price for a 3 pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Huge Price Hike
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered these in 6 months ago they were only 3.99 per pack. Now they are over EIGHT DOLLARS? That's a ridiculous price hike. These are decent tools but NOT worth the new price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Great product. I use these for my daughter's "unibrow" and they are perfect!
